topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553c9bf7636872306cac0400#post_553c9bf7636872306cac0400
+1

Anyway,

While Dragon Ball Z may be shorter than one piece, I think that a lot more is happening in the latter.

By episode 107 of Dragon Ball, The second saga ended.

By episode 107 of one piece, They've went through 10 different mini-arcs and are around the middle of the eleventh arc.

Since the main goal of each Saga isn't always in direct focus in one piece, It feels like a lot more is happening.

My point being that One piece isn't any worse than Dragon Ball Z. (At least it has next to no filler.)
